Ordzhonikidzevsky District (; Khakas: , Orconikidze aymağı) is an administrative and municipal district (raion), one of the eight in the Republic of Khakassia, Russia. It is located in the north of the republic. The area of the district is . Its administrative center is the rural locality (a settlement) of Kopyovo. Population:  The population of the administrative center accounts for 34.3% of the district's total population.
